source.b8cc65fe: ## Scraping weather news of the area: Vashi, Navi Mumbai
source.4308e887: ## Scraping weather news of the area: Belapur, Navi Mumbai
source.18ec7a4c:
This notebook is a tutorial on how to use the OpenWeatherMap API. We will create a dataset using the json data dump scraped using the OpenWeatherMap API. 

First, you must create a free account with OpenWeatherMap API https://home.openweathermap.org/
You will find the API Secret key under API Keys Menu in Profile Page
You can find API Calls Documentation https://openweathermap.org/api

Then, we will create a Python Script and use Request Module to consume the API Calls from OpenWeatherMap API. This way, we will create a Weather Dataset (CSV Document) for three regions in the city of Navi Mumbai. The JSON document is stored in a separate document after scraping.
